trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> händelsen för den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: Genom att lägga till en händelse hanterardelegaten att hantera den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>händelse, kan du utföra några ytterligare förbearbetning som krävs eller Avbryt databasfrågan helt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs klassen härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>klassen, som du kan avbryta en väntande <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>databasfrågan genom att ange den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan granska och ändra den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>samling och andra databasegenskaper fråga innan du kör frågan genom att öppna den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objekt som exponeras av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan även undersöka den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt som har överförts till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>metoden genom att öppna den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs används i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>metod för att ge åtkomst till en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>databasfrågan innan den körs.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen visar många händelser som du kan hantera för att fungera med de underliggande dataobjekt under loppet av en dataåtgärd.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Följande tabell visar vilka händelser och tillhörande <xref:System.EventArgs>klasser och -händelsehanterare delegater.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: | Händelsen | Händelseargument kan | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar innan data hämtas. | SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar före en insert-, update eller delete-åtgärd utförs. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Inträffar efter datahämtning, insert-, update- eller delete-åtgärden har slutförts. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> class, med det angivna <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objektet och alla <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> skickades till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: Den `inputParameters` parametern är en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>uppsättning namn/värde-par som matchar de som finns i Metodsignaturen och skickas via referens.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objekt som representerar den cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>frågan.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt har överförts till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt har överförts till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan undersöka den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt för att fastställa om sortering växling, eller en radantal krävs som en del av data hämtas igen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Använd databundna kontroller i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>klassen för att begära att den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>utföra ytterligare data som är relaterade åtgärder på en resultatmängd, t.ex sortera data eller returnera en delmängd av data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Dessa data som är relaterade åtgärder räknas upp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objektet, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om inget <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt har angetts under <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> skapas.
